title: Allow the predict StreamEvaluator to work on arrays as well as a single numeric parameter
description: Currently the simple regression's predict function only provides a prediction for a single numeric parameter. This ticket will allow the predict function to work on an array of numbers. In this scenario predict will return an array of predictions.

comments.content:
